segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of pure domesticity with a twist.

segments.text: The adult is so absorbed in her task, towel in hand.

segments.text: Yet the water from the sink is flooding out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she hasn't noticed; the damage is starting.

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly by the sink, waiting their turn.

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly things can go from calm to chaotic.
